subject: PEACE OF THE LORD BE WITH YO
body:
PEACE OF THE LORD BE WITH YOU !AMEN!!
My name is Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey from United States, I'm a widow suffering from Breast Cancer and Stroke, which denied me a child. As a result of that, i may not last till the next three months according to my doctor report. I was married to late Pastor Jeffrey Wilson, who was killed during the U.S raid, against terrorism in Afghanistan when he traveled to Afghanistan; and we were married for many years without any child before his death.
I'm a 68 years old woman and  I have some funds i inherited from my late husband the sum of (US$10,000,000:00) which i need a very honest and God fearing person who will claim the funds from the bank and use the funds for work of God Affair; like donation in the house of God, propagating the good news of God and to endeavor Good worshiping place and help less-privileged. I found your profile as i was reading Rhapsody of Realities healing prayer book. i felt you must be Honest to Almighty God; on the process the spirit of God ask me to contact you for the donation work of God Affair.
According to my doctor report i don't need any telephone communication in this regards because of my health,  so please if you would be able to use the funds for the work of God Affair like i stated earlier, please contact me back so i will lead you to ALPHA BANK where this funds were deposited by my late husband Pastor Jeffrey Wilson for you to retrieve the funds in your name as the next of kin for work of God Affair thanks. Kindly contact me so I can lead you to the bank where my late husband deposited the fund. please never you contact me if not Honest and have God fearing to use this donation for work of God, Please contact me through my private email (
belovedjeffrey005@gmail.com
)
I will stop here until i hear from you.
Always pray for my health.
May God bless you In Jesus name Amen!!!
Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey.

subject: Re:   PEACE OF THE LORD BE WITH YO
body:
Hello Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey,

I'm deeply moved by your story and I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. It's truly admirable that even in such a difficult time, you're thinking about doing God's work and helping others.

However, I have a few questions if you don't mind. Could you please tell me more about the work of God Affair? What kind of projects or initiatives does it involve? And how can one ensure that the funds are used appropriately for this cause?

Also, could you provide more details about the process of retrieving the funds from ALPHA BANK? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Eric

subject: Re: PEACE OF THE LORD BE WITH YOU !!
body:
Thanks for your email and concern about my health May God bless you.
The things i would like you to use the funds are: building orphanage
homes, paying hospital's bills for those that can't pay their hospital
bill, donate to churches, give to war torn countries and many more
good deeds.

On your next email, please send me your full name, resident address
and phone number so I can submit an application letter to Alpha Bank
for them to hand the funds over to you as my next of kin so you can
help me carry out my last wish on earth before I finally join my
creator in Heaven.

I appreciate you for the good work of God you are doing and I pray God
bless you as you continue to do it.

I will stop here until I hear from you,

Always pray for my health.
God will bless you.
Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey.

subject: Re: PEACE OF THE LORD BE WITH YOU !!
body:
Hello Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey,

Thank you so much for your kind words and blessings. It's truly heartwarming to hear about all the good deeds you're doing, especially in these challenging times. Your generosity is inspiring.

I'm curious, how did you get involved with Alpha Bank? And could you tell me more about the process of handing over funds? I'm not very familiar with it, but I'd love to learn more.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon. Please take care of your health.

Best wishes,
Eric

subject: Re: PEACE OF THE LORD BE WITH YOU !!
body:
Thank you for your email and God bless you.

In your next email, please send me your full name, resident address
and phone number so that I can send a request letter to Alpha Bank to
release the funds to you as my closest family member so that you can
help me carry out my last wish on earth.
I'll stop here until I hear from you

Always pray for my health.
God will bless you.
Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey.

subject: Re: PEACE OF THE LORD BE WITH YOU !!
body:
Hello Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm truly touched by your email and your situation. It's a noble cause that you're pursuing, and I'd be honored to help in any way I can.

However, before we proceed further, could you please provide me with more details about the process? How exactly will the funds be transferred? And what would my responsibilities be as your closest family member?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Eric

subject: Re: PEACE OF THE LORD BE WITH YO
body:
Thank you for your email and your concern for my health. May God bless
you!! Use the funds to build churches, orphanage homes, Pay hospital
bill for people and give the poor.

Please send me your full name, home address and phone number in your
next email so that I can send an application letter to Alpha Bank for
them to hand over the money to you as my next of kin to help me
execute my last one may wish on earth before finally joining my maker in heaven.

I appreciate you for the good work of God you are doing and I pray God
bless you as you continue to do so.

I'll stop here until I hear from you

Always pray for my health.
God bless you.
Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey.

subject: Re: PEACE OF THE LORD BE WITH YO
body:
Hello Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey,

Thank you so much for your kind and thoughtful email. It's heartwarming to hear about your noble intentions of helping others, especially in these challenging times. Building churches, orphanages, and paying hospital bills for those in need are indeed commendable acts of kindness.

However, I must apologize as I am unable to provide my personal details such as full name, home address, and phone number due to privacy concerns. I hope you understand.

Could you please share more about the process involved with Alpha Bank? How does it work exactly? And how can one ensure that the funds are used appropriately for the causes you mentioned?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon. Please take care of your health.

Best wishes,
Eric
